    A builder for a filesystem watch polling strategy.

    • Method Detail

      • executor

        public PollingStrategies.FilesystemWatchBuilder executor(ScheduledExecutorService executor)
        Sets a custom executor used to watch filesystem changes on.

        By default single-threaded executor is used.

        Parameters:
        executor - the custom scheduled executor service
        Returns:
        a modified builder instance

      • modifiers

        public PollingStrategies.FilesystemWatchBuilder modifiers(WatchEvent.Modifier... modifiers)
        Add modifiers to be used when registering the WatchService. See Path#register(WatchService, java.nio.file.WatchEvent.Kind[], Modifier...) Path.register}.
        Parameters:
        modifiers - the modifiers to add
        Returns:
        a modified builder instance
